69Investing in 
an Innovative 
Community  
In May 2021, ArcBest announced a $1 million 
investment in the Peak Innovation Center — a 
state-of-the-art career and technical education 
center that will be available to approximately 
43,000 students from 22 regional school 
districts in the Fort Smith, Arkansas, area. The 
center is scheduled to open the spring semester 
of 2022 and available programs will include 
network engineering technology, automation/
robotics, computer integrated machining and 
more. This opening is also an important step 
toward addressing community needs to create 
a pipeline of local talent to fill existing jobs and 
support further economic growth, and ArcBest 
is proud to invest in its development.
